Hi there, I'm Sourin Chakrabarti,

an aspiring Deep Learning Researcher.

I love designing and implementing algorithms that descend gradients to solve a challenging set of problems. As an Information Technology undergraduate at the IIIT, Allahabad, I spend most of my time learning how to do cool things with computers. In my freetime you can find me taking down the next video-game boss, enjoying an epic fantasy book, or trying to dribble past a defender in football/soccer. Here's a link to my CV.

Projects

Semantic Image Segmentation using 2D Projections of 3D Meshes.

Role: Core Contributer as Research Intern.
Tags: #Research #DeepLearning #ComputerGraphics #Photogrammetry
Homepage , Source Code

A complete data preparation (via ray casting) and deep learning pipeline for Semantic Image Segmentation of City Meshes using 2D Projections of the 3D Meshes.

Multi-Domain Localization of Autonomous Agent.

Role: Core Contributer (Team of 3).
Tags: #Research #DeepLearning #Robotics #ComputerVision
Homepage , Source Code

Localization of an agent running in a different domains by comparing with a static map. Siamese embeddings, custom dynamic-branched CNN, and particle filters used.

Learn.ai.

Role: Contributer (Team of 4).
Tags: #Hackathon #MachineLearning #AccessibleAI
Homepage , Source Code

Webapp to constuct ML models or neural networks in a "no-code" fashion, by dragging and dropping layers. Backed by NewGen IDEC.

DRDO: Super-resolution in the Wild

Role: Project Personnel (Team of 4).
Tags: #DeepLearning #GAN
Homepage , Source Code

Created a novel super-resolution dataset from real-world scenes with varying zoom levels. Trained an ESRGAN model and made it accessbile via a python software wrapper.

Stabilization Techniques for the Training of Generative Adversarial Networks

Role: Core Contributer as Research Intern.
Tags: #Research #DeepLearning #GAN
Homepage , Source Code

Stabilized the error oscillation of Discriminator by adding a damping term to its. objective function. Further, improved structural integrity of outputs by using a pre-training scheme.

Published: 21st October 2020

Link

Blogs delves into the structure, underlying principles, and forward propagation rule of graph convolutional networks.
